item.title: About
item.description: Welcome Â¶ Glad you found my page. I want to share some of the impressions I was able to capture through my (digital) lens. Also I am always curious to learn new concepts. Especially the progress in the field of Machine Learning (a.k.a. Artificial Intelligence) is really fascinating. In this blog I want to collect some of the codings I did over the years and to share ideas for novel learning approaches.

item.title: Coding
item.description: Check out my GitHub page for some of my coding projects. https://github.com/jkrol21 I published my first Streamlit App! Have a look at it to find out more about machine learning for fish type classification. https://share.streamlit.io/jkrol21/fish_ml_exploration/main
